mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updatedate from ( select /*+ INDEX(tbl_reply idx_reply) */ rownum rnum, rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updateDate from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno} and rno > 0 and rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) where rnum > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
